newProcess.title: How we transform your data into insights

step1.title: Upload your data
step1.description: Load files, connect databases or APIs securely and efficiently to power your AI system.

step2.title: Intelligent processing
step2.description: Our AI organizes, structures and processes your information automatically with the highest security standards.

step3.title: Chat and get insights
step3.description: Ask questions in natural language and receive accurate answers, automated reports and visualizations.

benefit1.title: Faster decisions
benefit1.description: Ask questions and get immediate answers.

benefit4.title: Flexible
benefit4.description: Adapts to any industry or business model.

benefit5.title: Scalable
benefit5.description: From small businesses to large corporations.

mastraHighlight.description3: , an open-source TypeScript framework designed for AI agents.
mastraHighlight.description5: applications, ready to scale in corporate environments.

step1.title: Complete security and traceability
step1.description: Every decision, tool and result of the agent is traced, audited and can be reviewed or controlled manually (human-in-the-loop).

step2.title: Real-time monitoring and automatic evaluations
step2.description: Agent behavior is observed live, with metrics and evals that guarantee quality, relevance and security of responses.

step3.title: Technological flexibility
step3.description: Integration with multiple models (OpenAI, Anthropic, Gemini, etc.) through a unified API, without needing to rewrite logic.

step4.title: Development efficiency
step4.description: Friendly environment for JavaScript/TypeScript teams, with CLI and playground that accelerate the development and testing cycle.

step5.title: Workflows and persistent memory
step5.description: Durable flows, integrated telemetry and native support for RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) that ensure consistency and scalability.

testimonials.title: Check out what our clients think

testimonial1.text: The implementation of LLM Apps completely transformed our operation. We can now process customer queries 10 times faster and with greater accuracy. It's incredible how AI understands the context of our business.
testimonial1.name: María González

testimonial2.text: Since we implemented the LLM Apps solution, our sales team has increased its productivity by 300%. The ability to get immediate insights from our data is revolutionary.
testimonial2.name: Carlos Mendoza

testimonial3.text: The security and ease of use of the platform convinced us from day one. Our employees immediately adopted the tool and the results have exceeded all our expectations.
testimonial3.name: Ana Rodríguez

faq.title: Answers to common questions
faq.subtitle: We answer the most common questions about our LLM Apps services and how they can transform your business.
faq.certDescription: At Cleverit we have the certification of
faq.certName: Microsoft Solutions Partner | Digital & App Innovation
faq.certFooter: Your business in the hands of a Microsoft-recognized specialist.
faq.certFeature1: Modernize and migrate your enterprise applications to the cloud
faq.certFeature2: Boost your developers' productivity with Microsoft Azure

question1.a: LLM Apps are intelligent applications that use large language models to process, analyze and generate content naturally. They allow companies to automate complex communication and data analysis tasks.

question2.q: What are the main features of LLMApps?
question2.a: Our LLM Apps include advanced natural language processing, integration with existing databases, customization according to your industry, automatic scalability and intuitive interfaces for non-technical users.

question3.q: Is my data secure when using LLM Apps?
question3.a: Absolutely. We implement end-to-end encryption, comply with international security standards such as ISO 27001, and your data is never shared with third parties. Additionally, we offer on-premise deployment options for maximum security.

question4.q: What differentiates your LLM Apps from other AI solutions?
question4.a: We specialize in customized solutions for each business, offer complete integration with existing systems, Spanish support, and a consultative approach that ensures AI truly solves your specific problems.

question5.q: What is the cost of developing an LLM App?
question5.a: The cost varies depending on complexity and specific features. We offer plans starting at $2,000 USD per month for basic solutions, up to customized enterprise projects. Contact us for a detailed quote.

question6.q: What type of support do you offer after launch?
question6.a: We provide 24/7 technical support, regular model updates, performance monitoring, team training, and continuous improvements based on actual use of your application.
